column4: AP Stats is a waste of time, i'm not going to waste my brains on that :P
what are you going to major in?
comp sci and mech engineering.  Hopefully dual major.  Robotics is the goal.
doesen't everyone go into Comp Sci? :P
my dad's a mechanical engineer, so, meh
I love computers, and I love machines.  Robotics seems logical.
boring stuff to me, hoping to major in pure mathematics, and if I feel so inclined as to pursue engineering, electrical engineering
it's amazing how fast a hobby can turn into a career.
well, I find math way more interesting than computers even, so... :P
and I bet it was a hobby as well!
I pursue higher math than my school's crappy career-based system allows me to take
which is why it should be your career!
well don't give us these silly random intervals :) 9 minutes! 6 minutes, 22 seconds, 6 and a half miliseconds!
I did that for Knife of Dreams, i'm not that excited about Ubuntu :P
